settings.caption: Introducing
settings.title: Project Pearl
settings.subtitle: Project Pearl, an exclusive microlot program, narrates the rich legacy of Ratnagiri Estate through eight high-scoring, experimentally processed coffees only available to Subko. It's an honor to share their story and craftsmanship.

settings.caption: Introducing
settings.title: Project Seven Sisters
settings.subtitle: Project Seven Sisters, Subko's sourcing initiative, celebrates the untapped coffee potential of India's Northeast. Despite the location's remoteness and the challenges related to it, the project showcases the distinct flavors of Nagaland, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Tripura, and Assam.

settings.caption: Introducing
settings.title: Subko VLGE
settings.subtitle: Subko VLGE: Cooperative Agriculture, rooted in Andhra Pradesh's K. Thadiputtu village, is a holistic initiative by Subko, focusing on empowering tribal farmers, fostering community growth, and advancing coffee's fourth wave.

settings.caption: Introducing
settings.title: Single Origin Microlots
settings.subtitle: We directly trade with origin coffee estates and smallholder farmers, collaborating on experimental processing. Our aim is to curate exceptional coffees, consistently scoring SCA 85 points and above.

settings.text: Where every sip is an exploration of meticulously sourced flavors of the Subcontinent. Crafted with precision by our skilled Arabica Q Graders, each bean is handpicked from regional plantations, ensuring a journey of unrivaled quality and flavor. Our commitment to bringing the origin to the forefront extends beyond the brew; it's a dedication to transparency, sustainability, and the pursuit of the most complex cup.

settings.title: Project Pearl: Subko x Ratnagiri Estate
settings.subtitle: Project Pearl, an exclusive microlot program, narrates the rich legacy of Ratnagiri Estate through eight high-scoring, experimentally processed coffees only available to Subko. It's an honor to share their story and craftsmanship.

settings.heading: Our Specialty Microlot Range
settings.subheading: We work in direct trade relationships at origin with coffee estates and smallholder farmers harvesting and (often experimentally) processing coffees that we aim to curate into only SCA 85+ point scoring coffees. Our Specialty Microlot Range is available as whole beans, but if you prefer to have it pre-ground, we can grind it for you in your desired grind size.

settings.text:
Specialty Excelsa feature by Akshay and Komal Dasrath from Mooleh Manay Estate, Coorg, Karnataka, India. Specialty Excelsa feature by Akshay and Komal Dasrath from Mooleh Manay Estate, Coorg, Karnataka, India.

Specialty Excelsa feature by Akshay and Komal Dasrath from Mooleh Manay Estate, Coorg, Karnataka, India.Specialty Excelsa feature by Akshay and Komal Dasrath from Mooleh Manay Estate, Coorg, Karnataka, India.

settings.heading: Subko VLGE: Cooperative Agriculture
settings.subheading: Founded by Subko Coffee Roasters and Bakehouse, the Subko Co-op initiative finds its roots in the village of K. Thadiputtu in Andhra Pradesh. Concentrating its efforts on the holistic advancement of the 'Subko Village,' Subko Co-op has adopted a cluster comprising six tribal farmers from K. Thadiputtu village in Paderu, Andhra Pradesh. With a dedication to bringing these individuals to the forefront of the third wave of coffee, Subko Co-op seeks to not only empower these farmers but to also nurture growth within their entire community.

settings.title: Bloom Bar: Recipes for your Specialty Beans

settings.text:
At Subko, we've consciously separated the two prevalent methods of coffee brewing â€“ machine-based at our Espresso Bar and manual brewing at the Bloom Bar. For every Specialty Coffee box that you've purchased from Subko, we have a recipe that details the right equipment and method for you to try.

For the perfect brew, reach out to us on Instagram (@subkocoffee) on DMs and share with us your brewing equipment details to get a custom recipe tailored for your Subko Specialty microlot coffee.

settings.heading: Brew Better at Home with Subko
settings.subheading: Wondering what brewing equipment works best with our Specialty Coffee beans? We've got you.

settings.text: Need your Specialty Coffee fix? Our Specialty Brews are available for delivery in Bombay on Swiggy/Zomato/Thrive.
